name: A Rat's Life: Day one
description:
We are two siblings from Montreal, QC, who sport the same initials: J.G.B.

FOLLOW THE GAME DEVELOPMENT

Nous remercions le Conseil des arts du Canada de son soutien.

-BUGS HISTORY-

- Cat mini game not handing out a carnival ticket: Make sure to download version 7 or above. You don't have to do anything to keep your save file, it will be linked to the new .exe.
